content.text: I am a four year old girl with brown eyes and hair. I sleep in a princess bed. I like playing outside in the sun with my dolls. My mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside.
I am a professional basketball player. I play for the Washington Wizards. I make 35 million a year. I went to college in Maryland. I live in a huge mansion.
That's so cool! I love basketball! I wish I could be a basketball player when I grow up.
You can be anything you want to be when you grow up. Just set your mind to it and work hard.
Thanks! I will!
So, what else do you like to do besides playing outside?
I like to read books, too. And I like to play with my dolls.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read books, too. But I don't have any dolls.
You should get some! They're a lot of fun.
Maybe I will.
Cool! I'll tell you all about my dolls.
Okay, sounds good.
So, what's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I really like the Harry Potter series.
Me too! I love Harry Potter!
I'm glad you agree! It's such a great series.
I know! I've read all of the books and watched all of the movies.
Me too! I'm such a huge fan.
Me too! I love Harry Potter.
Me too!
